column6:
What do you do when you're a gamma-irradiated monster on the run from the authorities? ROAD TRIP!! Bruce Banner hits the open highway with his best buddies, Rick Jones, Monkey and... Radioactive Man? Rick's not too happy with Bruce's new pal, but how does an ordinary guy get rid of a nuclear-powered super-villain who might be the key to saving Banner from the curse of the Hulk?,2007,9
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Paul Benjamin | inker:Gary Martin | penciller:David Nakayama | colorist:Wil Quintana | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):David Williams
